videos.title: Grieving Animals: Myth or Reality? | ARTE.tv Documentary
videos.description:
Baboons, ravens, dolphins and elephants - very different species at first glance, but they have one astonishing thing in common: they show complex emotional reactions when one of them dies. Biologists have documented remarkable behaviour over the years and are now trying to explain them scientifically. But do such behaviours really mean that animals consciously process death and loss? videos.title: I'm Going to Kill You | ARTE.tv Documentary
videos.description:
Domestic violence often goes hand in hand with psychological and emotional abuse. Filmmaker Karine Dusfour was given rare permission to film domestic violence trials in French courts and sheds light on the mechanisms of coercive control that can arise in relationships.
